website_summaries.verdict: An intensive moisturizing treatment that almost anyone can use. Though it's expensive, most consumers are happy with the results, and reported shiny, soft, conditioned hair.
pros: A versatile moisturizing treatment formulated for all types of hair
Helps smooth, protect, and bring out shine, and does a good job taming frizz
It also has a light, pleasant scent
cons: One of the most costly Wen products on the market
May build up on hair with extended use, but a clarifying shampoo will help prevent this result
